title: Understanding the Function and Graph
text: $$\lim_{x\to6} f(x)$$ is the value of f(x) as $$x$$ approaches $$6$$ from both sides. Locate $$x=6$$ on the graph and observe the value of f(x) from both sides.\n##figure2.gif##

title: Finding the Limit
text: What value is f(x) approaching when $$x$$ approaches $$6$$ from both sides? If the limit is $$\infty$$, write $$-\infty$$ or $$+\infty$$. If the limit does not exist, write 'DNE'.
speech: What value is f(x) approaching when  x  approaches  6  from both sides? If the limit is  infinity , write  negative infinity  or  positive infinity . If the limit does not exist, write 'DNE'.
